name: 3D Checkers Game
description:
Play Checkers against the computer, in 3D! Human vs AI, AI vs AI, Human vs Human!
- Completely free (not a demo, no locked options!)
- Powerful Checkers engine that can also simulate absolute beginner opponents
- Realistic 3D models, animations and sound effects
- Change the color of everything, including metallic effect for the pieces!
- Examine the match back and forth, move by move! Edit, resume etc.
- Improve your strategy by watching different A.I. levels play against each other!
- See what moves the A.I. is evaluating while processing
- Never played Checkers before? Quick start tutorial included!
